mng: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc

exm.mng: classifier for small spheres, pearls, corn grains, teeth, hearts, satellites etc

exm.cur: 一颗老鼠屎坏了一锅汤
exm.trd: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋湯
exm.mng: lit. a piece of rat feces spoiled the whole pot of soup (idiom), fig. one bad apple can spoil the whole bunch
exm.pyn: yī kē lǎo shǔ shǐ huài le yī guō tāng

exm.cur: 一颗老鼠屎坏了一锅粥
exm.trd: 一顆老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥
exm.mng: see 一粒老鼠屎壞了一鍋粥|一粒老鼠屎坏了一锅粥[yi1 li4 lao3 shu3 shi3 huai4 le5 yi1 guo1 zhou1]
exm.pyn: yī kē lǎo shǔ shǐ huài le yī guō zhōu

exm.mng: fine particle (PM 2.5), fine particulate matter (air pollution etc)
not a single grain was reaped (as in a bad harvest year)
